Field Detail

tabReference

WatchlistPanel tabReference
The entry tab managed. Passed as an argument to spawned windows, to wit, the item add window.

instrumentListModel

final javax.swing.DefaultListModel instrumentListModel
List model for the list of stock market symbols in the watchlist.

instrumentList

final javax.swing.JList instrumentList
The list of stock market symbols. This allows the user to select an instrument for display and then deletion or update.

tweet

final javax.swing.JCheckBox tweet
Selects whether or not to tweet adds and deletes to/from the watchlist.

getItemsArrayList

public final java.util.ArrayList<WatchlistItem> getItemsArrayList()
Sets up the ArrayList of watchlist items. (If for nothing else, this is needed for testing.)
